name: Usage of Sysinternals Tools
description: Detects the usage of Sysinternals Tools due to accepteula option being seen in the command line.
false_positives: Programs that use the same Registry Key
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`process.command_line:(*\ \-accepteula* OR *\ \/accepteula*)`
